snippet.title: Doctor Who Legacy Game | Doctor Who
snippet.description:
Team up with your favorite Doctor and head back through time in this brand new free to play mobile puzzle game! Build a team of your favorite Doctors, companions and allies including the newly added 6th, 7th and 8th Doctors, Handles the cyberman, Bracewell, Stormageddon and many more!

Doctor Who: Legacy is available now on Google Play https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tinyrebel.doctorwholegacy
and iTunes https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/doctor-who-legacy/id737628981?mt=8

Doctor Who: Legacy A new puzzle RPG game for mobile from BBC Worldwide, Tiny Rebel Games and Seed Studio, launches today. With an epic soundtrack by acclaimed video game composer Chris Huelsbeck and gorgeous character artwork, the game is a delight for any fan.  Easy to learn but hard to master game mechanics make it a perfect choice for the both the casual and hard-core gamer alike.
 
Launching with the last two seasons of Doctor Who, the game will eventually reach back into 50 years of the Doctor. Build a team of your favourite companions and allies drawn from the extensive and illustrious history of the show. Face the Doctor's most notorious enemies and relive the Doctor's greatest triumphs.  

Subscribe here for more exclusive Doctor Who clips and content
https://bbc.in/SubscribeToDoctorWho
WATCH MORE:
Compilations:  https://bbc.in/DWCompilations
Regenerations:  https://bbc.in/DWRegenerations
Title Sequences:  https://bbc.in/DWTitleSequences
New to Who: https://bbc.in/DWNewToWho
Official Podcast: https://bbc.in/DWOfficialPodcast

This is a commercial channel from BBC Studios. Service & Feedback https://www.bbcstudios.com/contact/contact-us/
